title: upgrade to icu > 60.2
description:
Currently we are at version 59.1. There is some change to breakiterator behavior, but I think it simplifies our code. Also our tools needed to be updated to pull some data files from new source code location. 
—
See comments below for reasons why we are explicitly skipping past 60.2
